text: Carlos Alberto Vidal Layseca (4 February 1931 - 24 September 2017) was a Peruvian physician and politician. He was born in Lima, Peru. Layseca served as Minister of Health from July 1990 through February 1991 under the Alberto Fujimori administration. He later served as Rector of Cayetano Heredia University from 1994 through 1999. Vidal Layseca died of heart disease on 24 September 2017 in Lima at the age of 86.Fallece ex Minsitro de Salud Carlos Vidal Layseca ==References== ==Other websites== * Facultad de Salud Pública y Administración "Carlos Vidal Layseca" Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Physicians Category:Politicians from Lima
title: Carlos Vidal Layseca
